üìä SYSTEM_CLARIFICATIONS.batch_vs_category: BATCH (supplier_extraction_batch_size=3) processes 3 categories simultaneously using sequential tab reuse due to browser manager's 1-tab limit. CATEGORY (max_products_per_category=4) limits individual category extraction to 4 products each.
üìä SYSTEM_CLARIFICATIONS.max_products_per_cycle: Controls Amazon analysis batching - processes products in groups before triggering financial reports and state saves. Does NOT affect supplier scraping phase.
üìä SYSTEM_CLARIFICATIONS.star_wars_fixed: FIXED: performance.matching_thresholds now integrated with configurable 0.25/0.5/0.75 thresholds preventing weak Amazon matches.
üìä SYSTEM_CLARIFICATIONS.new_toggles_integration: All new toggles (supplier_extraction_progress, supplier_cache_control, hybrid_processing, batch_synchronization) are fully integrated and functional.
üìä SYSTEM_CLARIFICATIONS.predefined_categories: System uses 279 predefined categories from poundwholesale_categories.json, NOT AI category selection.

archive_system.description: Archive system with supplier-specific targeting. Modes: 'full' (all files) or 'specific_supplier' (target_supplier only)

ai_selector_extraction.description: AI-powered selector extraction with customizable prompts
ai_selector_extraction.custom_prompt_text: Focus on extracting CSS selectors for product price, title, EAN/barcode, image, and navigation elements. Prioritize reliable selectors that work consistently across product pages.

prompt_injection.product_navigation_discovery_hints: OUT OF STOCK products show a red/orange badge or overlay with text like 'Out of Stock', 'Sold Out', or 'Unavailable'

discovery_assistance._comment: Two API calls are made: 1) login_discovery_hints for login elements, 2) product_navigation_discovery_hints for product/navigation selectors. You can paste full console elements, XPath, or any hints here.

available_modes.v2: New 25-line clearance-first prompt optimized for arbitrage

full_ai_workflow.description: Complete AI-driven supplier scraping + Amazon matching

direct_amazon_mode.description: Skip supplier scraping, go directly to Amazon extraction with predefined ASINs

hybrid_mode.description: Use predefined categories, skip AI selection

sequential.description: Complete all supplier extraction, then Amazon analysis

chunked.description: Alternate between supplier extraction and Amazon analysis

balanced.description: Process suppliers in batches, analyze each batch
